divs: Sighting DetailsIn the book Bible Code II author Michael Drosnin interviewed Israelimathematician Elihayu Rips who used a computer program to search for hidden skipcodes in the Hebrew Torah. Then we need to get thoseextraterrestrial objects dug up and figured out. The end really is near, if wesit on our butts.
